notice.message: A new version of Mesquite is available, version 3.70, with various new features and bug fixes. We urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here
A new version of Mesquite is available, version 3.61, with various new features and bug fixes. We urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here
A new version of Mesquite is available, version 3.61, with various new features and bug fixes. We urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here
A new version of Mesquite is available, version 3.61, with various new features and bug fixes. We urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here

A new version of Mesquite is available, version 3.61, with various new features and bug fixes, an offline manual and a new location for the website. We urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here

YOU ARE USING AN OLD VERSION of Mesquite. Your version is no longer supported. A new version of Mesquite is available, version 3.61, with various new features and bug fixes, compatibility with Java 9, an offline manual and a new location for the website. We urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here

YOU ARE USING AN OLD VERSION of Mesquite. Your version is no longer supported. A new version of Mesquite is available, version 3.61, with various new features and bug fixes, compatibility with Java 9, an offline manual and a new location for the website. We urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here

YOU ARE USING A VERY OLD VERSION of Mesquite. Your version is no longer supported. A new version is available, version 3.61, with many new features and bug fixes, compatibility with Java 9, performance improvements, an offline manual and a new location for the website. We strongly urge that you update to the new version by downloading it from here

This notice is to inform you that Mesquite now checks its web site for notices to users (such as this one) when it starts up. This should not cause a delay (if it does, please inform us). We anticipate notices will be given rarely, when there is an update available or an important bug to tell you about.
